resources.string: [ko]AppInfra is the components top level module. It gathers all the modules delivered by the AppInfra Common Component into one single structure. AppInfra facilitates dependency injection into common components and other software pieces that make use of the AppInfra functionalities.

[ko]Whenever users find any difficulty in using the app, they can use the Consumer Care feature to get the issues resolved. The app provides a number of ways the users can access Consumer Care support, such as live chat, e-mail, call, tweet, Facebook post, and so on.

[ko]In App Purchase feature in Reference App, provides the ability to buy products from the app for the users, which would give users the convenience of shopping anytime-anywhere. This approach also will boost marketing and sales.

[ko]Product registration is a common component, which facilitates the user to create/login into My Philips account and Register a Normal Product where by providing CTN Number, Serial Number(Mandatory) and Date of Purchase.

[ko]User registration feature in Reference App provides the ability of registering a new user accessing the mobile application, for logging into the application using valid organization social media specific credentials.
[ko]You can make Philips purchases or via 3rd party retailers here.
[ko]You can contact Philips consumer care here. Consumer Care is the destination for all Philips questions, product information and reviews.

[ko]This reference app is the starting point for any new patient medical or consumer mobile app. It is made up of configurable common components which are all part of the CDP2 Platform. It will help accelerate your app development, harmonize UX across Philips and ensures appropriate integration with HSDP.

[ko]ReferenceApp is a base platform used by all propositions to develop and maintain features both generic and specific to the propositions. App infra, Data Gateway, App FWK, and UIToolkit allow Apps to be created from uApps and UI-less services/libraries. ReferenceApp acts as a foundation over which CDP2 uApps and proposition specific uApps are integrated to form individual apps.

[ko]This app integrates the common components required to develop new IoT solutions for acceleration across Philips. It is the first reference for the development of all new patient medical or consumer mobile apps.
[ko]Designers, developers and business leaders across Philips.
[ko]Reference App comprises all of the configurable common components that are part of the CDP2 platform.
[ko]It provides all the reference information and tools needed to accelerate and harmonize UX development and ensure appropriate HSDP integration.
[ko]The UX has been fully approved by Philips Design and will soon be in DLS.
[ko]The complete platform is tagged and delivers data to monitor & improve your proposition.
[ko]The Security & Privacy actions of the complete platform are fully in line with Philips rule.
[ko]Localization of your proposition is enabled by the platform, including China.
[ko]The CDP2 platform is fully integrated with HSDP and IT to ensure all functionalities are enabled end-2-end within the Philips landscape.
[ko]I allow Philips to use my mobile application usage statistics
본인은 앱의 기능과 개선, 맞춤화, 소셜 미디어와의 통합, 관련 내용 및 광고의 표시를 위해 필립스에서 앱 데이터를 수집할 수 있도록 허용합니다.

쿠키 정책

이 앱에는 Adobe Systems Software Ireland Limited(“어도비”)에서 제공한 분석 서비스인 Adobe Analytics가 사용됩니다. Adobe Analytics는 “쿠키” 및 유사한 기술을 활용하며, 이는 당사의 앱을 통한 전체적인 트래픽 패턴을 분석할 수 있도록 사용자의 앱에 문서 파일 형태로 존재합니다. 쿠키에서 생성된 앱 사용 정보는 Adobe로 전송되며 저장되기 전에 먼저 익명화된 지리 위치와 IP주소를 일반 IP주소로 변환하도록 설정을 통해 관리합니다. Adobe는 필립스를 대신하여 앱 활동 및 앱 사용 관련 기타 정보를 필립스에 제공할 목적으로 앱 활동 관련 보고서를 수집하고 앱의 사용 평가에 관한 정보를 활용합니다. Adobe는 귀하의 IP 주소를 Adobe에서 소유한 다른 데이터와 연결하지 않습니다. 이 화면을 닫은 후에 참여하지 않기를 선택하면 Adobe와 필립스에 자료(쿠키 및 IP주소) 제공을 거부할 수 있습니다.
[ko]By revoking consent your data will be deleted from our servers.

귀하께서 동의하신 결과로 필립스 그룹은 홍보를 위해 이메일, SMS를 비롯한 모바일 앱, 소셜 미디어 등 기타 디지털 채널을 통해 귀하께 연락을 드릴 수 있습니다. 귀하의 선호도와 행동 양식 기반의 맞춤형 커뮤니케이션 및 최상의 개인 맞춤형 경험을 제공하기 위해 귀하의 개인정보를 분석하고 조합할 수 있습니다. 이러한 정보는 다음과 같습니다. 

귀하께서 제공하신 정보
당사와 공유하신 개인 정보에는 이름, 생년월일, 나이, 이메일 주소, 자택/회사 주소, 국가, 성별, 전화번호, 소셜 미디어 프로필 등이 있습니다.

필립스와의 소통 과정에서 취득된 정보
소셜 미디어, 웹 사이트, 이메일, 앱, 연계 제품 등 필립스 디지털 채널과의 소통 및 디지털 채널 사용을 통해 제공된 정보로, IP 주소, 쿠키, 장치 정보, 클릭한 커뮤니케이션, 위치 정보, 방문한 웹 사이트 등이 해당됩니다.

언제라도 동의를 철회하실 수 있습니다.
자세한 내용은 필립스 개인정보 보호정책 및 필립스 쿠키 정책을 참조하십시오.
[ko]We’ve detected that you have rooted the device or jailbroken, thereby making it easier for others to access your data and no security on your application data.
[ko]We’ve detected that you have jailbroken and not activated screenlock, thereby making it easier for others to access your data. We recommend enabling your screenlock.
[ko]We’ve detected the screenlock of your mobile phone is to enabled, thereby making it easier for others to access your data. We recommend enabling your screenlock.
[ko]Configuration can only be changed at launch time. You need to relaunch the app to change it.
[ko]I want to share my app data to help improve the app and provide me with personalized services

[ko]Adobe Analytics\\n\\nThis App uses Adobe Analytics, an analytics service (\\\"Adobe Analytics”) provided by Adobe Systems Software Ireland Limited (\\\"Adobe\\\") Adobe Analytics uses \\\"cookies\\\" or similar techniques, which are text files placed in your App, in order to help the App to analyze overall traffic patterns through our App. By transmitting the information generated by the cookie about the use of the App to Adobe, setting ensures that IP address is anonymized before geo-localization und will be replaced by a generic IP address before storage. On behalf of Philips, Adobe will use this information for the evaluation of your use of the App, compiling reports on App activity for Philips, and in order to provide other services relating to App activity and use of the App to IP address with any other data held Philips Adobe will not associate your by Adobe. You can prevent Adobe\\\'s and Philips collection and use of data out after you close this screen (cookies and IP address) if you opt-out after you close this screen.\\n\\nGoogle Firebase\\n\\nThis App uses Google Firebase, an app development service (Firebase) provided by Google Ireland Ltd (\\\"Google\\\"). Firebase uses cookies or similar techniques- SDK, which are text files placed in your App and web browser.\\n\\nOn behalf of Philips, Firebase will use information from your device such as your Device ID. IP address, your IDFA or Google Play Services ID and your MAC address and replace them with unique code. When you use the App we will measure the numbers of visits to the App, which pages you visit your network connection, load times and when the app crashes. We use this information to evaluate and understand your use of the App, to test and analyze performance and ultimately optimize our products and services.
